name: google-scholar
title: Google Scholar
description: Search Google Scholar for academic articles, papers, and research.
author: leandro.maia

tools.name: search-scholar
tools.title: Search Google Scholar Articles
tools.description: Searches Google Scholar for academic articles based on keywords, authors, publication, and year. Use this to find research papers.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
